title: Seven Soldiers (Grant Morrison)
description:
One of the most creative minds in comics, Grant Morrison (All Star Superman, The Invisibles, JLA, Animal Man) delivers his most groundbreaking and ambitious project yet: Seven Soldiers! The story comprises of seven different 4-issue miniseries and two bookend Specials.

Independently, each of these characters are featured in a story arc of their own that redefines their purpose in the DCU. But their stories also interweave with the other Soldiers' tales, forming a grander story of a devastating global threat to mankind ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ with the ties between them becoming more evident in each new volume. Together these reluctant champions must arise and somehow work together to save the world... without ever meeting one another!

Pack includes:

Seven Soldiers 0-1
Bulleteer 1-4
Frankenstein! 1-4
Guardian 1-4
Klarion the Witch-Boy 1-4
Mister Miracle 1-4
Shining Knight 1-4
Zatanna 1-4



Released on http://ComicPirates.info
